title: Could Windows 10 update be the cause of framerate lag?
body: Never had any issues until the update

replies.body:
It definitely could be, as we've gotten a decent amount of reports from players having FPS issues and system freezes after the Windows 10 anniversary update. I strongly recommend [disabling the Windows Game bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html), which was recently changed with the windows updates that came out not too long about. Some of these changes have been causing the issues I mentioned above, so I think this is a great place to start troubleshooting this.

Let me know if this helped.

Definitely possible, please read these threads:
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/gdEazY7E-fps-at-like-2-or-3-recently-all-game-need-help-ever-scince-a-windows-update?comment=0000 
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/KFxcVtYK-my-computer-is-randomly-freeezing-mid-game?comment=0000 
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/il5Qxm2w-if-you-are-still-having-the-bugsplat-bug-after-champ-select-read-this 
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes
There was a fix and I made a thread on it! Hope it helps you as well!

Dude! I already had windows 10 and everything was fine! Then it for ed updated itself this morning. When I got into game, my frame rate sat in between 5 and 7 that whole game! You are not the only one. If you have found a solution to the problem, please let me know! I will let you know if I find one as well. Best of luck bud!
